Text:
JoeW771 
where do you find all these.  I have the whole collection and it is awsome (and a lot - :)...

My personal Thanks but in deed, I've uploaded the whole collection at least 3 times (sometimes 5) back to your followers.

Thanks April47

If I told you where I got them, what would you need me for? I would be useless. My life would have no meaning. I would have to take that short walk into the long night.

But seriously, I just go to various websites, sometimes using a web crawler, sometimes manually to find them. You could too, but why? You have me.
